Posts.Content: Cougarlicious wrote: Okay it's a silly question but I gotta ask...would you go to a concert during chemo? I have great seats to a Dave Matthews concert, and the date falls a couple days after my second AC infusion. I haven't had (knock on wood) any SEs so far. Provided I'm feeling fine, can I still go or is it too risky? My MO is very conservative so I'm sure he'd advise me to stay in a closet for six months if I could. Diagnosed while 6 months pregnant...baby born 10/26 healthy with full head of hair despite three AC txs! Dx 7/2013, IDC, 3cm, Stage IIA, Grade 3, ER+/PR-, HER2- Chemotherapy 8/18/2013 AC + T (Taxol) Surgery 2/26/2014 Mastectomy: Right; Prophylactic mastectomy: Left; Reconstruction (left): Tissue expander placement; Reconstruction (right): Tissue expander placement Radiation Therapy 4/21/2014 Breast, Lymph nodes Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Concert during chemo? Cougarlicious sundermom
